Document:
# NOURISHMENT
[color=#a4885c]Hull Configuration:[/color] Medium, Bowside Docking, Portside Fly-up
[color=#a4885c]Crew Slots:[/color] 1 Chef, 2 Service Staff
[color=#a4885c]Power System:[/color] 2x SUPERPACMAN Uranium Generator
[color=#a4885c]Atmospherics:[/color] Gas Mixer
[color=#a4885c]Weapons:[/color] None
[color=#a4885c]IFF Designation:[/color] Civilian
"The Ursadyne Nourishment, a top of the line Restaurant Support Vessel. It has a full kitchen, greenhouse, and service area. It includes a Vox dining area and a convienent fly-up counter."
# SHIP FEATURES
## 1. Bridge
### 1.1. Control Systems
- Unlock the Shuttle computer using your ID card. - Use the Station Records computer to open up slots for the other crew members. - The Holopad can be used to directly contact other ships or stations.
### 1.2. Safety Systems
- Check that the EVA locker is filled with a hardsuit, air tank, and mini-jetpack. - The Yellow button on the table can be used to toggle the shutters. - The Red button toggles the thrusters and one of the generators. This helps reduce power use while parked
## 2. Culinary Service
### 2.1. Kitchen
- The Electric Range, Deep Fryer, Microwave, and Assembler can be used to cook a wide variety of food. - The Chef's Closet contains the basics to start cooking.
### 2.2 Greenhouse
- The Hydroponics Tray can be used to grow plants. - The Hydroponics Locker contains tools - The Hydroponics Seeds crate contains a variety of seeds to grow. - The Water Tank can be used to fill the Hydroponics Tray with water.
### 2.3. Service
- The ATM can be used to withdraw money. - The Soda Dispenser has a variety of non-alcoholic drinks. - The Condiment Dispenser gives guests a wide variety of condiments.
## 3. Engineering
### 3.1. Power System
- Check that the S.U.P.E.R.P.A.C.M.A.N. generator units are anchored to the floor. - Check that the SMES unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the Fuel Locker has spare fuel.
### 3.2. Atmospherics
- Set the Ships Air Alarms to Filtering (Wide) - Ensure that a gas canisters are wrenched to the connector ports. - Check that the air mixer is set to ~21% oxygen, ~79% nitrogen (Confirm Crew Biology).
### 3.3 Other Systems
- Check that the gyroscope is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled.
